import React,{useState} from 'react' import '../App.css' import axios from 'axios' export default function Login() { const [data, setdata] = useState({ firstname: "", lastname: "", username: "", email: "", password: "", role: "", phonenumber: "", address: "", salary: "" }) const handle_change = (e)=>{ setdata({...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const handle_submit = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const obh = { fullname: { firstname: data.firstname, lastname: data.lastname }, username: data.username, email: data.email, password: data.password, role: data.role, phonenumber: data.phonenumber, address: data.address, salary: data.salary } await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/auth/register", {}) } return ( <>
) }
